name: Wordium: Writing Platform
desc: Wordium is a writing platform contains story, knowledge, and perspective, post submit and edit features based on web. The project was developed for practicing Laravel and CRUD using Laravel, Blade, Tailwind CSS, daisyUI, MySQL, and others.

name: NoTimeToNews: News Portal
desc: NoTimeToNews is a news portal contains highlight and daily news, news submit and edit features based on web. The project was developed for practicing React and CRUD using React, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, daisyUI, MySQL, and others.

name: Luqman Herifa: Personal Portfolio v2
desc: Luqman Herifa is a personal portfolio v2 contains information about me, works, and social media contacts based on web. The project was developed for personal portfolio using React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, HTML/CSS, and others.

name: Quintess: Music Platform Landing Page
desc: Quintess is a music platform landing page contains information about platform advantages, features, and testimonials based on web. The project was developed for practicing slicing UI using CSS/HTML and JavaScript.

name: Senema: Movie Search Engine
desc: Senema is a movie search engine contains information about movie title, release date, plot, and others based on web. The project was developed for practicing fetch API using JavaScript, jQuery, and HTML/CSS.

name: Sterna: Apparel Store Catalog
desc: Sterna is an apparel store catalog contains information about product display, name, and price based on web. The project was developed for practicing fetch data using JavaScript, jQuery, and HTML/CSS.

name: Luqman Herifa: Personal Portfolio v1
desc: Luqman Herifa is a personal portfolio v1 contains information about me, education, projects, and social media contacts based on web. The project was developed for personal portfolio using JavaScript, Bootstrap, HTML/CSS, and others.

name: Simpro: Profile and Blog
desc: Simpro is a profile and blog articles based on web, developed individually for practicing React using React, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS.
